name: /setfly
help: Toggle fly mode and set the movement speed
code: local player; for k, v in pairs(...) do if type(v) == 'Player' then player = v; break; end end; local char = player.character; char:setSwimming(not char:isSwimming())

name: /explodeAt
help: Create explosion at the aim positino

functions.name: sv_explodeAt
functions.code: local player; for k, v in pairs(...) do local _type = type(v); if _type == 'Player' then player = v end end; local char = player.character; local pos = char.worldPosition; local hit, result = sm.physics.raycast(pos, pos + char.direction * 1000); if hit then sm.physics.explode(result.pointWorld, 10, 10, 10, 10, 'PropaneTank - ExplosionBig') end
